definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: That braised lobster is just delicious.
sentences.chinese: 那道红烧小龙虾真的太好吃了。

sentences.english: Well, I'll have beef pie, sauté fish and tomato soup.
sentences.chinese: 好，我就要牛肉饼，红烧鱼和番茄汤。

sentences.english: Pls, come to the window, I will give you some red-roasted pork.
sentences.chinese: 到窗户边上来一下，我给你们盛了一碗红烧肉。

sentences.english: I proudly pointed at the pig's feet braised in soy sauce, revelling in my own achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我指着红烧猪蹄，得意洋洋，自我陶醉。

sentences.english: Of these, my favorite dishes to eat the fish is braised .
sentences.chinese: 其中，我最喜欢吃的菜是红烧鱼。

sentences.english: Chinese rhubarb eel, abluent go splanchnic add condiment edible of braise in soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 大黄鳝鱼一条，洗净去内脏加调料红烧食用。

sentences.english: The paper briefly introduced production technology and quality standard of braising soy.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍生产红烧酱油的生产工艺和质量标准。

sentences.english: Is there any other way to cook pigeon other than roasted?
sentences.chinese: 乳鸽除了红烧之外还有其他的烹制方法吗？

sentences.english: Food Suggestions: Enjoy with lamb dishes, soft cheeses and braised oxtail or pork in brown sauce.
sentences.chinese: 可与羊肉，软干酪，闷牛尾或红烧肉一起享用。

sentences.english: Since we download the coupons from the website, we have braised pork in brown sauce in free.
sentences.chinese: 因为从网上打了优惠券，所以，红烧肉是免费赠送的。

sentences.english: I'd like to have the braised eggplant too.
sentences.chinese: 我也去打一份红烧茄子。

sentences.english: Today, her mother burned to eat my favorite braised fish.
sentences.chinese: 今天，她的母亲活活吃我最喜欢的红烧鱼。

sentences.english: The fourth dish, stewed beef father is made of method for a while.
sentences.chinese: 第四道菜，红烧牛肉爸爸是用爆炒法做的。

sentences.english: Braised ribbonfish, fried eggplant, vegetable soup , rice.
sentences.chinese: 红烧带鱼，酱爆茄丁，蔬菜汤，米饭。

sentences.english: We have Curried Chicken with Rice and Stewed Beef with Noodle.
sentences.chinese: 我们有咖喱鸡饭和红烧牛肉面。

sentences.english: I also like "stew beef noodle soup".
sentences.chinese: 我也喜欢吃“红烧牛肉面“。

definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
Sichuan poached sliced fish in hot chili oil
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
to stew in soy sauce and spices
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise

yuxiang, a seasoning of Chinese cuisine that typically contains garlic, scallions, ginger, sugar, salt, chili peppers etc (Although "yuxiang" literally means "fish fragrance", it contains no seafood.)
